A Ruby on Rails App

General Info

A Game of Thrones Database.

Project Details

A Ruby on Rails application based on characters from popular Book/ TV Show 'A Song of Ice & Fire'.

Results

This Ruby on Rails App has multiple models and views for the different kings and regions and their corresponding houses and characters. It also has a sign-up page with full CRUD functionality for the user to create a new character and assign house, title, etc. Full code available on Github.

Online version Github!
